LanguageData.PrisonBreaksUpgraded_UseMoodLabel: Use mood threshold to prevent prison breaks
LanguageData.PrisonBreaksUpgraded_UseMoodTooltip: If enabled, prisoners must be at or above the selected mood threshold to attempt prison breaks. If disabled, mood will not be checked.
LanguageData.PrisonBreaksUpgraded_UseTerrorLabel: Use Terror to prevent prison breaks (Ideology)
LanguageData.PrisonBreaksUpgraded_UseTerrorTooltip: If enabled, prisoners with terror at or above the threshold will never attempt prison breaks. Works independently of mood checking - both checks must pass for a prison break to be allowed.
LanguageData.PrisonBreaksUpgraded_TerrorThresholdTool: Prisoners with terror at or above this percentage will never attempt prison breaks. Terror is increased by terror sculptures, gibbet cages, and skullspikes.
LanguageData.PrisonBreaksUpgraded_NoChecksWarning: Warning: Both mood and terror checks are disabled. All prisoners will be able to attempt prison breaks.
